result.eng: If you wait a second I'll ask him.
result.ga: Má fhanann tú soicind fiafróidh mé de
result.orig: Má fhanann tú soicind fiafróidh mé de
result.html: Má fhanann tú soicind fiafróidh mé deIf you wait a second I'll ask him.
result.ponchtml: Má ḟanann tú soicind fiafróiḋ mé deIf you wait a second I'll ask him.

result.eng: Don't ask me to do it, I wouldn't be able for it.
result.ga: Ná hiarr sin orm ní bhéinn in ann aige
result.orig: Ná hiarr sin orm ní bhéinn in ann aige
result.html: Ná hiarr sin orm ní bhéinn in ann aigeDon't ask me to do it, I wouldn't be able for it.
result.ponchtml: Ná hiarr sin orm ní ḃéinn in ann aigeDon't ask me to do it, I wouldn't be able for it.

result.eng: It is not appropriate for the police to ask me such questions.
result.ga: Ní cóir do na póilíní ceisteanna mar seo a chur orm
result.orig: Ní cóir do na póilíní ceisteanna mar seo a chur orm
result.html: Ní cóir do na póilíní ceisteanna mar seo a chur ormIt is not appropriate for the police to ask me such questions.
result.ponchtml: Ní cóir do na póilíní ceisteanna mar seo a ċur ormIt is not appropriate for the police to ask me such questions.

result.eng: Now, I'd like to ask you a couple more questions about pastimes.
result.ga: Anois ba mhaith liom cúpla ceist eile a chur ort faoi chaitheamh aimsire
result.orig: Anois ba mhaith liom cúpla ceist eile a chur ort faoi chaitheamh aimsire
result.html: Anois ba mhaith liom cúpla ceist eile a chur ort faoi chaitheamh aimsireNow, I'd like to ask you a couple more questions about pastimes.
result.ponchtml: Anois ba ṁaiṫ liom cúpla ceist eile a ċur ort faoi ċaiṫeaṁ aimsireNow, I'd like to ask you a couple more questions about pastimes.

result.eng: It was foolish of me to ask that question.
result.ga: B'amaideach an mhaise domsa an cheist a chur
result.orig: B'amaideach an mhaise domsa an cheist a chur
result.html: B'amaideach an mhaise domsa an cheist a churIt was foolish of me to ask that question.
result.ponchtml: B'amaideaċ an ṁaise domsa an ċeist a ċurIt was foolish of me to ask that question.
